name: offroad simulator 4x4 games
description:
offroad simulator 4x4 games

offroad simulator 4x4 is an open world 4x4 driving simulator where you can drive offroad in a woodland environment doing awesome stunts, crashing into objects and exploring the amazing Game.

Game is created to bring realistic offroad car 3D experience on mobile devices.
Simulator comes with different cars, true physics, professional car control system!

Be a furious off-road racing driver on several different environments for you. No need to brake because of city traffic parking or racing other rival vehicles, so you can perform illegal stunt actions and run full speed without the police chasing your 4x4 SUV truck!

Drifting fast and doing burnouts New open environment offroad had never been so fun! Burn the asphalt or climb a hill, but always show your racer skills!

Select your preferred car drive it through a strong 3D unknown but exhilarating landscape. There are Multi levels, each has its own difficulties and hours of unlimited fun with 3D designed car.

Also enjoy real car jumping experiences in jump levels and show high level driving skills.

The amazing effects for a new simulation of hummer car! These amazing tracks and several levels will make go crazy.

Key Features:

=> Thrilling sounds
=> Easy Controlling
=> User Friendly Game
=> Different Car models
=> Full real HUD including revs, gear and speed.
=> ABS, TC and ESP simulation. You can also turn them off!
=> Explore a detailed open world environment.
=> Accurate Real driving physics.
